title: Happy Birthday, Shizuku-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Happy birthday, Shizuku-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Thanks, Ruby-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>I got you a present. Go ahead and open it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ooh, I wonder what it is~ ...oh, a book on sewing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>I think this one’s really easy to understand. It has notes on how to handle delicate fabrics and remove small stains.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Thank you~!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Wha-!? S-Shizuku-chan!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I’ve always wanted something like this! There’s so many books on sewing, right? I never could figure out which one I should get... Would it be alright if all of us at Nijigaku used this as a reference?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Of course! Ehehe... I hope it’ll help all of you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>It will~! Thank you so much~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Y-you’re squishing me~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
